group_1.textLeft: Good news, Kyubey.
It seems my powers of foresight @are actually helpful for you, too.
I've found a girl with potential@unlike any we've ever seen...
She could become the strongest@Magical Girl yet!

group_1.textRight: Oh, really?@You can see that with your power?

group_1.textLeft: Yes... However, I am merely an @observer in my visions...
Which is to say I don't have the@power to affect their outcomes...
So I'm telling you, the creator of@Magical Girls.
Hopefully this information will be@of use to you.
May you find a Magical Girl who can@save the world from the Witches...

group_1.textRight: Your candidate for my next Magical Girl.
I think she's a little too young,@but she definitely has potential.
I'll keep an eye on her and reach @out when the time is right...

group_1.textLeft: Very good.@I'm glad I was some use to you.

group_1.textRight: All right then, I'm going to @go see how she's doing.

group_1.textLeft: By all means, do.@I hope everything turns out well.
(That's it, go on and waste your time...)
(Keep chasing Yuma Chitose.)
(That ought to keep you away from the@girl who will destroy the world...)
(Oh, Kyubey...@You're playing right into my hands.)
Kyoooko... Where are you?
!!!@Who...are you...?
Kyoko!@Do you know where Kyoko is?!

group_1.textRight: Kyoko Sakura...@Is she still with us? Or…

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what?@Kyoko's already what?!

group_1.textRight: She is destined to die fighting a Witch,@after all...

group_1.textLeft: No... That's not true!@It can't be true! I'll save her!
!!!@[chara:400301:motion_300]I'm...not...useless...!
Kyoko! Kyoooko!!!
Kyo...Kyoko!@I have to...help Kyoko!

group_1.textRight: Make a contract with me and become@a Magical Girl to make your wish come true.
